Welcome to the
Exclusive NFTicket
Collection

A unique collection of exclusive, randomly generated avatars that live on the blockchain. By owning one of these avatars, you will have access to multiple exclusive utilities, rewards, and memberships powered by NFTicket and bloXmove.

But it’s not just about owning a cool avatar — the majority of the profits from the sale of the NFTs will be donated to various charities. So not only will you be part of an exclusive community, but you will also be making a difference in the world.
